code: import React,{useCallback,useEffect,useContext}from'react';import Key from'./Key';import{AppContext}from'../App';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var Keyboard=function Keyboard(){var keys1=["Q","W","E","R","T","Y","U","I","O","P"];var keys2=["A","S","D","F","G","H","J","K","L"];var keys3=["Z","X","C","V","B","N","M"];var _useContext=useContext(AppContext),onSelectLetter=_useContext.onSelectLetter,onDelete=_useContext.onDelete,onEnter=_useContext.onEnter,disabledLetters=_useContext.disabledLetters;var handleKeyboard=useCallback(function(event){if(event.key==="Enter"){onEnter();}else if(event.key==="Backspace"){onDelete();}else{keys1.forEach(function(key){if(event.key.toLowerCase()===key.toLowerCase()){onSelectLetter(key);}});keys2.forEach(function(key){if(event.key.toLowerCase()===key.toLowerCase()){onSelectLetter(key);}});keys3.forEach(function(key){if(event.key.toLowerCase()===key.toLowerCase()){onSelectLetter(key);}});}});useEffect(function(){document.addEventListener("keydown",handleKeyboard);return function(){document.removeEventListener("keydown",handleKeyboard);};},[handleKeyboard]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"keyboard",onKeyDown:handleKeyboard,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line1",children:keys1.map(function(key){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Key,{keyVal:key,disabled:disabledLetters.includes(key)});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"line2",children:keys2.map(function(key){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Key,{keyVal:key,disabled:disabledLetters.includes(key)});})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"line3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Key,{keyVal:"ENTER",bigKey:true}),keys3.map(function(key){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Key,{keyVal:key,disabled:disabledLetters.includes(key)});}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Key,{keyVal:"DELETE",bigKey:true})]})]});};
